thread.title: Barcelona star Luis Suarez celebrates 30th birthday - Daily Mail

title: Barcelona star Luis Suarez celebrates 30th birthday - Daily Mail
text: Share 47 shares Suarez has scored 19 goals in 27 appearances for Barcelona so far this season but the La Liga champions have found the going tough so far in 2016-17. Luis Enrique's side are currently third in the table and trail second place Sevilla by one point and leaders Real Madrid by two. Barcelona are next in action on Thursday in the Copa del Rey, where they host Real Sociedad. They won the first leg 1-0. Suarez has scored 19 times in 27 appearances so far for Barcelona in the 2016-17 season Barcelona are currently third in La Liga and trail leaders Real Madrid by two points Following the cup encounter, they take on Real Betis on Saturday, who Suarez scored a hat-trick against earlier this season. Suarez joined Barcelona in the summer of 2014 in an Â£80million deal. Share or comment on this article 47
